title: P-plater who allegedly killed a pregant woman has been granted bail
text:
P-plater who allegedly killed a pregant woman has been granted bail

We’re sorry, this feature is currently unavailable. We’re working to restore it. Please try again later.

summary: A childcare worker whose "singular error" allegedly caused a horrific crash, killing a pregnant woman and her unborn child, has been granted release on bail.
